resources.string: Felder um Briet ervirhiewen (leschten Zuch a Schach)

string.name: zenMode
string.comment:
zenMode
This is not the religious meaning. Turning this option on takes away make elements of the user interface.
Can also translate as 'Focus mode' as one example.

resources.string: Verstopp all Wäertungen op der Websäit, fir dass du dech voll op de Schach konzentréieren kanns. Partien können ëmmer nach gewäert sinn, et geet just drëm, wat du gesäis.
Regeler fir Brietgréisst ze änneren weisen

string.name: exceptInGame
string.comment: An option regarding when player ratings should be displayed. This will display other players' ratings at all times, EXCEPT during a game. Please see screenshot - text needs to be kept short to fit in the segmented control widget used for settings.

string.name: whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
string.comment:
The < symbol becomes "<" (less than symbol). It is not required in your translation; you can write it as a word for example. Just do NOT use < in its place, or your translation will have to be removed.
Technical information: < is a reserved character in HTML, which is why it cannot be used.

string.name: gameBehavior
string.comment:
gameBehavior
In the user settings page, "Game behavior" is the title of the tab for configuring how the player can interact with the game.

resources.string: Virauszich (wärend dem Géigner sengem Zuch spillen)
Dréck ob deng <ctrl> Tasten während der Emwandlung fir temporär déi automatesch Emwandlung ze desaktivéieren

string.name: whenTimeRemainingLessThanThirtySeconds
string.comment:
The < symbol becomes "<" (less than symbol). It is not required in your translation; you can write it as a word for example. Just do NOT use < in its place, or your translation will have to be removed.
Technical information: < is a reserved character in HTML, which is why it cannot be used.

resources.string: Kann während der Partie desaktivéiert ginn iwwert den Brietmenü

string.name: snapArrowsToValidMoves
string.comment:
snapArrowsToValidMoves
The 'arrows' are for quick annotations you can do on the board, by holding right mouse button. With this setting enabled, it means the arrows will align themselves to places were pieces can move.

resources.string: Feiler können just legal Zich weisen

string.name: sayGgWpAfterLosingOrDrawing
string.comment:
sayGgWpAfterLosingOrDrawing
When enabled, this setting will automatically send 'Good game, well played' to your opponent if you are lose or draw the game. It's meant as a courtesy message.
The message will be sent in ENGLISH.
It is up to you how to deal with this. For example, you may want to put '(message will be sent in English)' in your translated text as one example. Or you can leave the actual English text and put a brief translation in your own language.

resources.string: No Defaite oder Remis \"Good game, well played\" (Gudd Partie, gudd gespillt) soen
Scroll iwwer d\'Briet fir Zich nozespillen
Gerät Benoriichtegung wanns du net ob Lichess bass

string.name: blindfold
string.comment: Appears in the in-game preferences view. Enabling the blindfold option will hide all the pieces.
